source: Joseph's Discord Friend - Proven Dynasty Winner

league_context.competitive_level: High - Proven winner across multiple leagues

joseph_analysis.core_philosophy: Front-loaded all assets to win NOW - zero draft picks until round 4 of 2026

strategic_insights.qb_strategy: Walking zero or hero Justin Fields + vision quest Aaron Rodgers in Arthur Smith offense - viable because that's all he can get
strategic_insights.rb_philosophy: Alpha roles everywhere - explosive RB1s dominating their backfields

specific_takes.achane: Literal lightning bolt that scams PPR points like he's playing WR
specific_takes.gibbs: Taking over Lions backfield - Montgomery aging + knee injury, Gibbs went nuclear without him

strategic_insights.tee_higgins: Legit WR#2 in FPG - depth chart WR2 only because Ja'Marr Chase exists, Joe Burrow hero ball + garbage time
strategic_insights.rashee_rice: Getting suspended but no one cares - Mahomes jams him with layup targets

strategic_principles.asset_consolidation: Traded away all future picks to acquire win-now talent
strategic_principles.positional_alpha: Every player is alpha in their role/offense
strategic_principles.explosive_upside: Portfolio of boom players rather than safe floor
strategic_principles.opportunity_over_pedigree: Fields/Rodgers at QB because that's what's available
strategic_principles.volume_based_value: Targets/touches in high-scoring offenses over talent grades

comparison_to_joseph.joseph_approach: Depth-heavy, multiple paths to victory, future-focused
comparison_to_joseph.winner_approach: Concentrated talent, all-in on current window, explosive upside
comparison_to_joseph.key_difference: Winner sacrificed future for present dominance
